description: In this course you will not only learn all of the apps and software you will need to go to High School, College or Graduate School using an all digital paperless workflow, but you will also learn techniques to capture information, cite it properly and use it in your writing and papers. Upon completion of this course you will be able to apply these tools and techniques to your own process to make you more efficient and organized. You will be able to demonstrate to your teachers and professors greater mastery of the information again with proper citation all with less effort than a paper process.
title: Going All Digital in School
